entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning then snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023
